margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none” align=”center” el_class=”tj-margin-10″]How Does Tailor Junction Work?[/mk_fancy_title][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ color=”#777777″ size=”24″ font_weight=”300″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” align=”center”]It’s simple, affordable and risk free.[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”tj-hiw-steps-section”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][mk_icon_box2 icon_type=”image” icon_size=”128″ icon_image=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/measure-up.png” title=”Pick” title_size=”25″ title_weight=”bold”]Once you book the appointment, our representative will call you and a time will be scheduled for the pickup, then tailor will take measurements and pick your fabric.[/mk_icon_box2][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][mk_icon_box2 icon_type=”image” icon_size=”128″ icon_image=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/design.png” title=”Stitch” title_size=”25″ title_weight=”bold”]Outfit will be stitched under experts guidance.[/mk_icon_box2][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][mk_icon_box2 icon_type=”image” icon_size=”128″ icon_image=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/get-product-on-your-doorstep.png” title=”Deliver” title_size=”25″ title_weight=”bold”]After stitching the outfit will be delivered at your place, and if there will be any alteration required, the tailor will redo again and redeliver it at your place.[/mk_icon_box2][mk_padding_divider size=”80″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” css=”.vc_custom_1603646250074{background-color: #f7f4ef !important;}”
